original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyam aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sa cīvara bhattam paṭiyattam hoti

original: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū yena saḥ pūgaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu
detha āvuso imāni cīvarāni imesam bhikkhūnam ti
amhākam saṅghassa anuvassam sa cīvara bhikkhā paññattā ti

original: “Bahū, āvuso, saṅghassa dāyakā, bahū saṅghassa bhattā.
analyzed: bahū āvuso saṅghassa dāyakāḥ bahū saṅghassa bhattā

original: Ime tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharanti.
analyzed: ime tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantāḥ idha viharanti

original: Tumhe ce imesaṁ na dassatha, atha ko carahi imesaṁ dassati?
analyzed: tumhe ce imesam na dassatha atha kaḥ carahi imesam dassati
detha āvuso imāni cīvarāni imesam bhikkhūnam ti

original: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ datvā saṅghaṁ bhattena parivisi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ pūgaḥ chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḍiyamānaḥ yathāpaṭiyattam cīvaram chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam datvā saṅgham bhattena parivisi

original: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ “na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dinnan”ti te evamāhaṁsu—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sa cīvara bhattam paṭiyattam na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam dinnanti te evam āhasu

original: Yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ ayyā chabbaggiyā ayyānaṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ pariṇāmesun”ti.
analyzed: yathāpaṭiyattam cīvaram ayyā chabbaggiyā ayyānam chabbaggiyānam pariṇāmesunti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmetha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
analyzed: sāmam vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti saḥ vā āroceti
cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārāḥ antamasaḥ cuṇṇa piṇḍaḥ api danta kaṭṭham pi dasika suttam pi

original: “dassāma karissāmā”ti vācā bhinnā hoti, taṁ puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dassāma karissāma ati vācā bhinnā hoti tam puggalassa pariṇāmeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: pariṇate pariṇata saññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Pariṇate vematiko puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: pariṇate vematiko puggalassa pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa
pariṇate apariṇata saññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti anāpatti

original: Saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: saṅghassa pariṇatam añña saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: cetiyassa pariṇatam añña cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Puggalassa pariṇataṁ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: puggalassa pariṇatam añña puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa
a pariṇate pariṇata saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: “yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṁ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ cittaṁ pasīdati tattha dethā”ti bhaṇati,
analyzed: yattha tumhākam deyya dhammaḥ paribhogam vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāram vā labheyya cira ṭṭhitikaḥ vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākam cittam pasīdati tattha detha iti bhaṇati
